## What is it?

--

* Import citations

--

* Gather metadata from pdf files

--

* Allow organization in a data base

--

* Allow annotations

--

* Produce formatted citations in various formats

---

## Functionalities

--

* Add papers
  * From pdf and mannualy

--

* Organization
  * Folders and subfolders
  * Add tags
  * Search

--

* Pdf reader
  * Annotation
  * Notes

--

* Citation and bibliography
